WebHelpDocumentation.Title: Documentation
WebHelpDocumentation.ShortHelp: Opens help on the current command or context.
WebHelpDocumentation.LongHelp: Provides contextual, task-oriented help on the current command in-app, or using your favorite browser.
WebHelpOverview.Title: Overview
WebHelpOverview.ShortHelp: Briefly describes the purpose of the app.
WebHelpOverview.LongHelp: The Overview includes a high-level list of basic functionality, and specifies the targeted audience.
WebHelpWhatsNew.Title: What's New
WebHelpWhatsNew.ShortHelp: Displays new and enhanced functionality for the current app.
WebHelpWhatsNew.LongHelp: What's New content describes the changes in all releases and the benefits those changes bring to users.
WebHelpTutorials.Title: Tutorials
WebHelpTutorials.ShortHelp: Displays the tutorials for the current app.
WebHelpTutorials.LongHelp: Tutorials help users understand the app, guiding users through the app's key features, and ensure users a smooth start to using the app.
WebHelpKeyboardShortcuts.Title: Keyboard Shortcuts
WebHelpKeyboardShortcuts.ShortHelp: Provides ways to quickly run commands.
WebHelpKeyboardShortcuts.LongHelp: Keyboard shortcuts improve your productivity while using the app.
WebHelpUserCommunity.Title: User Community
WebHelpUserCommunity.ShortHelp: Opens the community associated with the app, if available.
WebHelpUserCommunity.LongHelp: 3DSwym lets you interact with other users, and ask questions.
WebHelpLearningCenter.Title: Learning Center
WebHelpLearningCenter.LongHelp: Provides help on learnign the app.
